text.tspan: In the 1990s, there was a popular fast food chain named 'Ed’s'
that featured an animatronic named 'Ed' as its main attraction.
However, in 1998, a tragic event occurred. A man whose identity
was never revealed, took the life of a 9-year-old boy. The boy's
body was discovered in front of Ed's show stage one morning.
Many people believed the animatronic was responsible for the
boy’s death, so the owner had no choice but to shut down the
restaurant and dismantle the Ed robot. After being severely
damaged, Edward was thrown back into the facility where he
was originally built. This act unknowingly increased his sentience
and fueled his hatred for humanity. The man responsible for the boy's
death was never caught, but it’s possible that he's the same father
whose kid got crushed inside an Ernie suit.
